resources.string:
1. Click on the Instagram icon at the InstarReposter to launch the Instagram

 2. Click the options button at the top right of the instagram picture -> Copy Share Click on the URL menu

 3. InstarReposter will automatically capture your photos.

 4. Reposting can be done by pressing the repost button at the bottom left of InstarReposter

Instagram Photo Repost App


InstarReposter v1.0


Created by Go Kyung Joon on March 13, 2017
